column1: velma pauline carpenter| mrs. velma pauline polly carpenter age 76 of sewanee gained herangels wings on saturday
column4: she was a daughter of the late jay c. gass and pressie gudger gass . she was married to ambrose carpenter who preceded her in death along with her brothers
column6: raymond and jerry gass. polly loved music and is now singing in heavens choir and she was a caring lady that was devoted to her family. she is survived by her son
column7: timothy rambo carpenter of sewanee; special friends crystal shetters and haley wallace of sherwood and many friends and relatives. a graveside service will be held at 10:00 a. m. tuesday in franklin memorial gardens with brother james taylor officiating. the family will receive friends monday from 1:00 to 9:00 p. m. at the funeral home. in lieu of flowers contributions may be made to cumberland funeral home
column10: tennessee 37356. on line condolences may be made at: www. cumberlandfuneralhome. net. cumberland funeral home
column13: tennessee is serving the carpenter family.
